thm rpnnen1lem2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cn)), wcel(csup(c0, cr, clt), cz))
  -| wceq(c0, crab(s2, cz, wbr(co(cv(s2), cdiv, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0))))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cr, cmpt(s1, cn, co(csup(c0, cr, clt), cdiv, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cn)), wcel(csup(c0, cr, clt), cz)), wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cr, cmpt(s1, cn, co(csup(c0, cr, clt), cdiv, cv(s1))))))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cn)), wcel(csup(c0, cr, clt), cz)), diffss(s0, s1))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cn)), wcel(csup(c0, cr, clt), cz)), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cn)), wcel(csup(c0, cr, clt), cz)), diffsc(s1, c1))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cn)), wcel(csup(c0, cr, clt), cz)), diffsc(s2, c1))
  sseldi(csup(c0, cr, clt), cz, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cn)))
  mp3an2i(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cn)), wcel(csup(c0, cr, clt), c0), wss(c0, cz), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(hs0, cr, wral(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), cle, cv(hs0)))))
  ssrab3(s2, c0, cz, wbr(co(cv(s2), cdiv, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0)))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cn)), wne(c0, emptycls), wne(crab(s2, cz, wbr(co(cv(s2), cdiv, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0))), emptycls))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cn)), wne(crab(s2, cz, wbr(co(cv(s2), cdiv, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0))), emptycls), wrex(s2, cz, wbr(co(cv(s2), cdiv, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0))))
  mpbird(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cn)), wrex(s2, cz, wbr(co(cv(s2), cdiv, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0))), wrex(s2, cz, wbr(cv(s2), clt, co(cv(s1), cmul, cv(s0)))))
  syl(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cn)), wrex(s2, cz, wbr(cv(s2), clt, co(cv(s1), cmul, cv(s0)))), wcel(co(cv(s1), cmul, cv(s0)), cr))
  simpld(wcel(co(cv(s1), cmul, cv(s0)), cr), wrex(s2, cz, wbr(cv(s2), clt, co(cv(s1), cmul, cv(s0)))), wrex(s2, cz, wbr(co(cv(s1), cmul, cv(s0)), clt, cv(s2))))
  btwnz(s2, s2, co(cv(s1), cmul, cv(s0)))
  rexbidva(s2, cz, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cn)), wbr(co(cv(s2), cdiv, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), clt, co(cv(s1), cmul, cv(s0))))
  rabn0(s2, cz, wbr(co(cv(s2), cdiv, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0)))
  neeq1i(c0, emptycls, crab(s2, cz, wbr(co(cv(s2), cdiv, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0))))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cn)), wrex(hs0, cr, wral(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), cle, cv(hs0)))), wcel(co(cv(s1), cmul, cv(s0)), cr), wral(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), cle, co(cv(s1), cmul, cv(s0)))))
  sylan2(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cn), wcel(co(cv(s1), cmul, cv(s0)), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cr))
  ancoms(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cr), wcel(co(cv(s1), cmul, cv(s0)), cr))
  ralrimiva(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cn)), wbr(cv(s2), cle, co(cv(s1), cmul, cv(s0))))
  sylan2b(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cn)), wcel(cv(s2), c0), wbr(cv(s2), cle, co(cv(s1), cmul, cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(s2), cz), wbr(co(cv(s2), cdiv, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0))))
  rabeq2i(s2, c0, cz, wbr(co(cv(s2), cdiv, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0)))
  impr(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cn)), wcel(cv(s2), cz), wbr(co(cv(s2), cdiv, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), cle, co(cv(s1), cmul, cv(s0))))
  sylbid(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cn)), wcel(cv(s2), cz)), wbr(co(cv(s2), cdiv, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), cle, co(cv(s1), cmul, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s2), clt, co(cv(s1), cmul, cv(s0))))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cn)), wcel(cv(s2), cz)), wb(wbr(co(cv(s2), cdiv, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), clt, co(cv(s1), cmul, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s2), cr), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cr), wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s1))))
  ad2antlr(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cn), wcel(cv(s2), cz), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cr), wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s1))))
  jca(wcel(cv(s1), cn), wcel(cv(s1), cr), wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s1)))
  nngt0(cv(s1))
  ltdivmul(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s1))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cn)), wcel(cv(s2), cz)), wi(wbr(cv(s2), clt, co(cv(s1), cmul, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s2), cle, co(cv(s1), cmul, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s2), cr), wcel(co(cv(s1), cmul, cv(s0)), cr))
  adantl(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cn)), wcel(cv(s2), cz), wcel(cv(s2), cr))
  zre(cv(s2))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cn)), wcel(cv(s2), cz)), wcel(co(cv(s1), cmul, cv(s0)), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cr), wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  ad2antlr(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cn), wcel(cv(s2), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cr))
  nnre(cv(s1))
  simpll(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cn), wcel(cv(s2), cz))
  remulcl(cv(s1), cv(s0))
  ltle(cv(s2), co(cv(s1), cmul, cv(s0)))
  brralrspcev(s2, hs0, co(cv(s1), cmul, cv(s0)), cr, c0, cv(s2), cle)
  suprzcl(hs0, s2, c0)
  diff.cz.s(s2)
  diff.co.s(s2, cv(s1), cmul, cv(s0))
  diff.cmul.s(s2)
  diff.wa.s(s2, wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cn))
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s0), cr)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cr.s(s2)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s1), cn)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cn.s(s2)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(co(cv(s1), cmul, cv(s0)))
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s2))
  diff.hs0.c(cle)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}

thm rpnnen1lem2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ s1 ∈ ℕ)→ sup(c0, ℝ, <)∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ c0 = { s2 ∈ ℤ |(s2[÷]s1)[<]s0 }
  ⊣ c1 =(s0 ∈ ℝ ↦(s1 ∈ ℕ ↦(sup(c0, ℝ, <)[÷]s1)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(((s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ s1 ∈ ℕ)→ sup(c0, ℝ, <)∈ ℤ), c1 =(s0 ∈ ℝ ↦(s1 ∈ ℕ ↦(sup(c0, ℝ, <)[÷]s1))))
  a1ii(((s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ s1 ∈ ℕ)→ sup(c0, ℝ, <)∈ ℤ), d(s0, s1))
  a1ii(((s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ s1 ∈ ℕ)→ sup(c0, ℝ, <)∈ ℤ), d(s0, c1))
  a1ii(((s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ s1 ∈ ℕ)→ sup(c0, ℝ, <)∈ ℤ), d(s1, c1))
  a1ii(((s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ s1 ∈ ℕ)→ sup(c0, ℝ, <)∈ ℤ), d(s2, c1))
  sseldi(sup(c0, ℝ, <), cz, c0, (s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ s1 ∈ ℕ))
  mp3an2i((s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ s1 ∈ ℕ), sup(c0, ℝ, <)∈ c0, c0 ⊆ ℤ, c0 ≠ ∅, ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s2 ∈ c0, s2[≤]hs0)))
  ssrab3(s2, c0, cz, (s2[÷]s1)[<]s0)
  sylibr((s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ s1 ∈ ℕ), c0 ≠ ∅, { s2 ∈ ℤ |(s2[÷]s1)[<]s0 } ≠ ∅)
  sylibr((s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ s1 ∈ ℕ), { s2 ∈ ℤ |(s2[÷]s1)[<]s0 } ≠ ∅, ∃(s2 ∈ ℤ,(s2[÷]s1)[<]s0))
  mpbird((s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ s1 ∈ ℕ), ∃(s2 ∈ ℤ,(s2[÷]s1)[<]s0), ∃(s2 ∈ ℤ, s2[<](s1[×]s0)))
  syl((s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ s1 ∈ ℕ), ∃(s2 ∈ ℤ, s2[<](s1[×]s0)), (s1[×]s0)∈ ℝ)
  simpld((s1[×]s0)∈ ℝ, ∃(s2 ∈ ℤ, s2[<](s1[×]s0)), ∃(s2 ∈ ℤ,(s1[×]s0)[<]s2))
  btwnz(s2, s2, (s1[×]s0))
  rexbidva(s2, cz, (s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ s1 ∈ ℕ), (s2[÷]s1)[<]s0, s2[<](s1[×]s0))
  rabn0(s2, cz, (s2[÷]s1)[<]s0)
  neeq1i(c0, emptycls, { s2 ∈ ℤ |(s2[÷]s1)[<]s0 })
  syl2anc((s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ s1 ∈ ℕ), ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s2 ∈ c0, s2[≤]hs0)), (s1[×]s0)∈ ℝ, ∀(s2 ∈ c0, s2[≤](s1[×]s0)))
  sylan2(s0 ∈ ℝ, s1 ∈ ℕ, (s1[×]s0)∈ ℝ, s1 ∈ ℝ)
  ancoms(s0 ∈ ℝ, s1 ∈ ℝ, (s1[×]s0)∈ ℝ)
  ralrimiva(s2, c0, (s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ s1 ∈ ℕ), s2[≤](s1[×]s0))
  sylan2b((s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ s1 ∈ ℕ), s2 ∈ c0, s2[≤](s1[×]s0), (s2 ∈ ℤ ∧(s2[÷]s1)[<]s0))
  rabeq2i(s2, c0, cz, (s2[÷]s1)[<]s0)
  impr((s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ s1 ∈ ℕ), s2 ∈ ℤ, (s2[÷]s1)[<]s0, s2[≤](s1[×]s0))
  sylbid(((s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ s1 ∈ ℕ)∧ s2 ∈ ℤ), (s2[÷]s1)[<]s0, s2[≤](s1[×]s0), s2[<](s1[×]s0))
  syl3anc(((s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ s1 ∈ ℕ)∧ s2 ∈ ℤ), ((s2[÷]s1)[<]s0 ↔ s2[<](s1[×]s0)), s2 ∈ ℝ, s0 ∈ ℝ, (s1 ∈ ℝ ∧ 0[<]s1))
  ad2antlr(s0 ∈ ℝ, s1 ∈ ℕ, s2 ∈ ℤ, (s1 ∈ ℝ ∧ 0[<]s1))
  jca(s1 ∈ ℕ, s1 ∈ ℝ, 0[<]s1)
  nngt0(s1)
  ltdivmul(s2, s0, s1)
  syl2anc(((s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ s1 ∈ ℕ)∧ s2 ∈ ℤ), (s2[<](s1[×]s0)→ s2[≤](s1[×]s0)), s2 ∈ ℝ, (s1[×]s0)∈ ℝ)
  adantl((s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ s1 ∈ ℕ), s2 ∈ ℤ, s2 ∈ ℝ)
  zre(s2)
  syl2anc(((s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ s1 ∈ ℕ)∧ s2 ∈ ℤ), (s1[×]s0)∈ ℝ, s1 ∈ ℝ, s0 ∈ ℝ)
  ad2antlr(s0 ∈ ℝ, s1 ∈ ℕ, s2 ∈ ℤ, s1 ∈ ℝ)
  nnre(s1)
  simpll(s0 ∈ ℝ, s1 ∈ ℕ, s2 ∈ ℤ)
  remulcl(s1, s0)
  ltle(s2, (s1[×]s0))
  brralrspcev(s2, hs0, (s1[×]s0), cr, c0, s2, cle)
  suprzcl(hs0, s2, c0)
  diff.cz.s(s2)
  diff.co.s(s2, s1, cmul, s0)
  diff.cmul.s(s2)
  diff.wa.s(s2, s0 ∈ ℝ, s1 ∈ ℕ)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, s0, cr)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cr.s(s2)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, s1, cn)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cn.s(s2)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c((s1[×]s0))
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(s2)
  diff.hs0.c(cle)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}

thm rpnnen1lem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), co(cq, cmap, cn)))
  -| wceq(c1, crab(s1, cz, wbr(co(cv(s1), cdiv, cv(s2)), clt, cv(s0))))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cr, cmpt(s2, cn, co(csup(c1, cr, clt), cdiv, cv(s2)))))
  -| wcel(cn, universe)
  -| wcel(cq, universe)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), co(cq, cmap, cn))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), co(cq, cmap, cn))), diffsc(s1, c0))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), co(cq, cmap, cn))), diffsc(s2, c0))
  eqeltrd(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), co(cq, cmap, cn), cmpt(s2, cn, co(csup(c1, cr, clt), cdiv, cv(s2))), wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  mpan2(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmpt(s2, cn, co(csup(c1, cr, clt), cdiv, cv(s2)))), wcel(cmpt(s2, cn, co(csup(c1, cr, clt), cdiv, cv(s2))), universe))
  mptex(s2, cn, co(csup(c1, cr, clt), cdiv, cv(s2)))
  fvmpt2(s0, cr, cmpt(s2, cn, co(csup(c1, cr, clt), cdiv, cv(s2))), universe, c0)
  sylibr(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cmpt(s2, cn, co(csup(c1, cr, clt), cdiv, cv(s2))), co(cq, cmap, cn)), wf(cmpt(s2, cn, co(csup(c1, cr, clt), cdiv, cv(s2))), cn, cq))
  fmptd(s2, cmpt(s2, cn, co(csup(c1, cr, clt), cdiv, cv(s2))), cn, cq, co(csup(c1, cr, clt), cdiv, cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  sylancom(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s2), cn), wcel(co(csup(c1, cr, clt), cdiv, cv(s2)), cq), wcel(csup(c1, cr, clt), cz))
  sseldi(csup(c1, cr, clt), cz, c1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s2), cn)))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s2), cn)), wcel(csup(c1, cr, clt), c1), wss(c1, cz), wne(c1, emptycls), wrex(hs0, cr, wral(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(hs0)))))
  a1i(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s2), cn)), wss(c1, cz))
  eqsstri(c1, cz, crab(s1, cz, wbr(co(cv(s1), cdiv, cv(s2)), clt, cv(s0))))
  ssrab2(s1, cz, wbr(co(cv(s1), cdiv, cv(s2)), clt, cv(s0)))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s2), cn)), wne(c1, emptycls), wne(crab(s1, cz, wbr(co(cv(s1), cdiv, cv(s2)), clt, cv(s0))), emptycls))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s2), cn)), wne(crab(s1, cz, wbr(co(cv(s1), cdiv, cv(s2)), clt, cv(s0))), emptycls), wrex(s1, cz, wbr(co(cv(s1), cdiv, cv(s2)), clt, cv(s0))))
  mpbird(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s2), cn)), wrex(s1, cz, wbr(co(cv(s1), cdiv, cv(s2)), clt, cv(s0))), wrex(s1, cz, wbr(cv(s1), clt, co(cv(s2), cmul, cv(s0)))))
  syl(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s2), cn)), wrex(s1, cz, wbr(cv(s1), clt, co(cv(s2), cmul, cv(s0)))), wcel(co(cv(s2), cmul, cv(s0)), cr))
  simpld(wcel(co(cv(s2), cmul, cv(s0)), cr), wrex(s1, cz, wbr(cv(s1), clt, co(cv(s2), cmul, cv(s0)))), wrex(s1, cz, wbr(co(cv(s2), cmul, cv(s0)), clt, cv(s1))))
  btwnz(s1, s1, co(cv(s2), cmul, cv(s0)))
  rexbidva(s1, cz, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s2), cn)), wbr(co(cv(s1), cdiv, cv(s2)), clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, co(cv(s2), cmul, cv(s0))))
  rabn0(s1, cz, wbr(co(cv(s1), cdiv, cv(s2)), clt, cv(s0)))
  neeq1i(c1, emptycls, crab(s1, cz, wbr(co(cv(s1), cdiv, cv(s2)), clt, cv(s0))))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s2), cn)), wrex(hs0, cr, wral(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(hs0)))), wcel(co(cv(s2), cmul, cv(s0)), cr), wral(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, co(cv(s2), cmul, cv(s0)))))
  sylan2(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s2), cn), wcel(co(cv(s2), cmul, cv(s0)), cr), wcel(cv(s2), cr))
  ancoms(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s2), cr), wcel(co(cv(s2), cmul, cv(s0)), cr))
  ralrimiva(s1, c1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s2), cn)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, co(cv(s2), cmul, cv(s0))))

  ⊢ (s0 ∈ ℝ →(c0 ` s0)∈(ℚ[↦]ℕ))

  ⊣ c0 =(s0 ∈ ℝ ↦(s2 ∈ ℕ ↦(sup(c1, ℝ, <)[÷]s2)))
  ⊣ ℕ ∈ 𝕌

  mpan2(s0 ∈ ℝ, (c0 ` s0)=(s2 ∈ ℕ ↦(sup(c1, ℝ, <)[÷]s2)), (s2 ∈ ℕ ↦(sup(c1, ℝ, <)[÷]s2))∈ 𝕌)

  sylibr(s0 ∈ ℝ, (s2 ∈ ℕ ↦(sup(c1, ℝ, <)[÷]s2))∈(ℚ[↦]ℕ), ((s2 ∈ ℕ ↦(sup(c1, ℝ, <)[÷]s2)): ℕ → ℚ))

  syl3anc((s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ s2 ∈ ℕ), sup(c1, ℝ, <)∈ c1, c1 ⊆ ℤ, c1 ≠ ∅, ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, s1[≤]hs0)))
  a1i((s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ s2 ∈ ℕ), c1 ⊆ ℤ)
  eqsstri(c1, cz, { s1 ∈ ℤ |(s1[÷]s2)[<]s0 })
  ssrab2(s1, cz, (s1[÷]s2)[<]s0)
  sylibr((s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ s2 ∈ ℕ), c1 ≠ ∅, { s1 ∈ ℤ |(s1[÷]s2)[<]s0 } ≠ ∅)
  sylibr((s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ s2 ∈ ℕ), { s1 ∈ ℤ |(s1[÷]s2)[<]s0 } ≠ ∅, ∃(s1 ∈ ℤ,(s1[÷]s2)[<]s0))
  mpbird((s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ s2 ∈ ℕ), ∃(s1 ∈ ℤ,(s1[÷]s2)[<]s0), ∃(s1 ∈ ℤ, s1[<](s2[×]s0)))
  syl((s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ s2 ∈ ℕ), ∃(s1 ∈ ℤ, s1[<](s2[×]s0)), (s2[×]s0)∈ ℝ)
  simpld((s2[×]s0)∈ ℝ, ∃(s1 ∈ ℤ, s1[<](s2[×]s0)), ∃(s1 ∈ ℤ,(s2[×]s0)[<]s1))
  btwnz(s1, s1, (s2[×]s0))

  ad2antlr(s0 ∈ ℝ, s2 ∈ ℕ, s1 ∈ ℤ, (s2 ∈ ℝ ∧ 0[<]s2))
  jca(s2 ∈ ℕ, s2 ∈ ℝ, 0[<]s2)
  nngt0(s2)
  ltdivmul(s1, s0, s2)
  syl2anc(((s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ s2 ∈ ℕ)∧ s1 ∈ ℤ), (s1[<](s2[×]s0)→ s1[≤](s2[×]s0)), s1 ∈ ℝ, (s2[×]s0)∈ ℝ)

blocks.name: rpnnen1
blocks.content: One half of ~ rpnnen , where we show an injection from the real numbers to sequences of rational numbers. Specifically, we map a real number ` x ` to the sequence ` ( F `` x ) : NN --> QQ ` (see ~ rpnnen1lem6 ) such that ` ( ( F `` x ) `` k ) ` is the largest rational number with denominator ` k ` that is strictly less than ` x ` . In this manner, we get a monotonically increasing sequence that converges to ` x ` , and since each sequence converges to a unique real number, this mapping from reals to sequences of rational numbers is injective. Note: The ` NN ` and ` QQ ` existence hypotheses provide for use with either ~ nnex and ~ qex , or ~ nnexALT and ~ qexALT . The proof should not be modified to use any of those 4 theorems. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-May-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Jun-2013.) (Revised by NM, 15-Aug-2021.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: cnref1o
blocks.content: There is a natural one-to-one mapping from ` ( RR X. RR ) ` to ` CC ` , where we map ` <. x , y >. ` to ` ( x + ( _i x. y ) ) ` . In our construction of the complex numbers, this is in fact our _definition_ of ` CC ` (see ~ df-c ), but in the axiomatic treatment we can only show that there is the expected mapping between these two sets. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Jun-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Feb-2014.)

}
